title: geth syncs slowly(blocknumber: Around 12,247,694)
body:
# geth version

```
Geth
Version: 1.10.3-unstable
Git Commit: 4b783c0064661be55fd35b765c2a90d1f9b9abcb
Git Commit Date: 20210421
Architecture: amd64
Go Version: go1.16.3
Operating System: linux
GOPATH=
GOROOT=go
```

16 vCPU 32 GiB

# ps

- I thought it was because the version of geth was too low, but  I still have this problem when upgrading geth
Are you running it from a locally attached SSD? You need to.
